    Package Description

    ClusterService API.
    io.hekate.cluster.event
    API for handling cluster events.

    « start hereMain entry point to Hekate API.

    Plugins API.

    Services API.
    io.hekate.metrics.cloudwatch
    Support for metrics publishing to Amazon CloudWatch.

    Support for metrics publishing to InfluxDB.

    Support for metrics publishing to StatsD.
    io.hekate.spring.bean
    Spring Framework integration.
    io.hekate.spring.boot
    Spring Boot integration.
    io.hekate.spring.boot.metrics.local
    Auto-configuration for ClusterMetricsService.

      Synchronously initializes this instance and joins the cluster.

      Constructs a new Hekate instance and synchronously joins the cluster.
      Hekate Hekate.leave()
      Synchronously leaves the cluster and terminates this instance.
      Hekate Hekate.terminate()
      Synchronously terminates this instance.
